alert.note: Alert for Central Tularosa Basin; Sierra County Lakes; Southern Tularosa Basin; Uplands of the Bootheel; West Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 14 at 1:12PM MST until December 15 at 11:00AM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...LOCATION CORRECTION FOR WIND ADVISORY TEXT... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Southwest Bootheel, the lowlands of Sierra County, and the east slopes of the Organ and San Andres Mountains. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 11 AM MST Wednesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds will occur between 3AM and 9 AM, especially for east slope areas.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Central Tularosa Basin; Sierra County Lakes; Southern Tularosa Basin; Uplands of the Bootheel; West Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet
